name: Bots & Found
description:
• 1.07 Development - May 15th 2019
    • Changed background color. 
    • Increased achievement alpha. 
    • Removed Buried Pets. 
    • Added Rusty Bot Parts. 
    • Added Pesky Bugs. 
    • Added Voluntolds. 
    • Added BOTS 10 achievement. 
    • Added BOTS 100 achievement. 
    • Added BOTS 1K achievement.
  • 1.06 Development
    • Removed debug features.
    • Changed from prototype name to development name.
  • 1.05 Prototype
    • More wording changes.
    • Increased achievement alpha settings.
    • Added a floor texture.
    • Changed floor color.
  • 1.04 Prototype
    • Updated instructions.
    • Mark is easier on the eyes.
    • Added achievements.
